github:Sagnac/streamsave.name: streamsave
github:Sagnac/streamsave.desc: Script aimed at saving live streams and clipping online videos without encoding.

kiwec:cutitout.name: cutitout
kiwec:cutitout.install-notes: Press F12 in MPV to toggle silence skipping.

github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/Blackbo.name: Blackbox
github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/Blackbo.desc: Advanced, modular media browser, file manager and playlist manager for mpv.
github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/Blackbo.install-notes: If you want to use any of the JavaScript utilities, you must also download the scripts/modules.js/ folder and place it within your own scripts/ folder, exactly how it's laid out in this project.

github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/Leapfro.name: Leapfrog
github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/Leapfro.desc: Effortlessly jump through your playlist, with your own custom jump size and direction, including the ability to jump randomly. Excellent when queuing lots of images and using mpv as an image viewer.

github:AssrtOSS/mpv-assrt.name: mpv-assrt
github:AssrtOSS/mpv-assrt.desc: Download subtitles from assrt.net, with interactive OSD menu.

github:zc62/mpv-scripts/screenshot-to-cl.name: screenshot-to-clipboard
github:zc62/mpv-scripts/screenshot-to-cl.desc: Generates a temp screenshot file on desktop then copy to clipboard. (Windows only)

github:stax76/mpv.net/seek-show-position.name: seek-show-position
github:stax76/mpv.net/seek-show-position.desc: Shows the position and duration when seeking formatted as 70:00 / 80:00 instead the built in 01:10:00 / 01:20:00.

github:Arieleg/mpv-takeSsSequence.name: takeSsSequence
github:Arieleg/mpv-takeSsSequence.desc: Take a sequence of equispaced screenshots.

www.npmjs.com:mpv-script.name: TypeScript definitions (for developers)
www.npmjs.com:mpv-script.desc: Type definitions for builtin mp modules and globals.

github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/modules.name: VideoPlayerCode's Modules.js (for developers)
github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/modules.desc: Tons of pre-written, open source JavaScript modules which helps you rapidly create your own JS user scripts (including a very helpful script config system based on mpv's Lua mp.options API). All modules are free to use (and extend) in your own scripts!

github:mrxdst/webtorrent-mpv-hook.name: webtorrent-mpv-hook
github:mrxdst/webtorrent-mpv-hook.desc: Adds a hook that allows mpv to stream torrents. It also provides a osd overlay to show info/progress.

github:mpv-player/mpv/acompressor.lua.name: acompressor
github:mpv-player/mpv/acompressor.lua.desc: Dynamic range compressor using acompressor ffmpeg filter with controls to dynamically adjust parameters.

github:AN3223/dotfiles/always-play-on-st.name: always-play-on-startup
github:AN3223/dotfiles/always-play-on-st.desc: Always play on startup, never start playback in a paused state.

github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/audio-balance.name: audio-balance
github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/audio-balance.desc: Port of mpv's balance property to FFmpeg lavfi pan filter.

github:fbriere/mpv-scripts/audio-file-ke.name: audio-file-keys
github:fbriere/mpv-scripts/audio-file-ke.desc: Automatically apply key bindings when playing audio files.

github:mpv-player/mpv/autocrop.lua.name: autocrop
github:mpv-player/mpv/autocrop.lua.desc: Automatically crop the video by using lavfi's cropdetect filter to detect black bars.

github:mpv-player/mpv/autodeint.lua.name: autodeint
github:mpv-player/mpv/autodeint.lua.desc: Automatically deinterlace the video by using lavfi's idet filter to detect interlaced content.

github:mpv-player/mpv/autoload.lua.name: autoload
github:mpv-player/mpv/autoload.lua.desc: Automatically load playlist entries before and after the currently playing file, by scanning the directory.

github:zc62/mpv-scripts/autoloop.lua.name: autoloop
github:zc62/mpv-scripts/autoloop.lua.desc: Automatically loops files that are under a given duration (default 5 seconds).

github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/auto-profiles.name: auto-profiles
github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/auto-profiles.desc: Automatically apply profiles based on predicates written as Lua expressions.

github:AN3223/dotfiles/auto-save-state.l.name: auto-save-state
github:AN3223/dotfiles/auto-save-state.l.desc: Periodically saves progress with write-watch-later-config, and also cleans up the watch later data after the file is finished playing (so playlists may continue at the correct file).

gist:Hakkin/5489e511bd6c8068a0fc09304c9c.name: autosave
gist:Hakkin/5489e511bd6c8068a0fc09304c9c.desc: Periodically saves "watch later" data during playback, rather than only saving on quit.

github:kevinlekiller/mpv_scripts/autospe.name: autospeed
github:kevinlekiller/mpv_scripts/autospe.desc: To adjust monitor refresh rate and video speed for almost 1:1 playback. (*nix)

github:kevinlekiller/mpv_scripts/autospe.name: autospeedwin
github:kevinlekiller/mpv_scripts/autospe.desc: To adjust monitor refresh rate and video speed for almost 1:1 playback. (Windows)

github:davidde/mpv-autosub.name: autosub
github:davidde/mpv-autosub.install-notes:
Copy this path to the subliminal variable at the start of the script:
local subliminal = '/path/to/your/subliminal'
github:davidde/mpv-autosub.desc:
Fully automatic subtitle downloading. No hotkeys required.
Clear setup instructions for Windows, Mac and Linux.

gist:Hakkin/4f978a5c87c31f7fe3ae.name: betterchapters
gist:Hakkin/4f978a5c87c31f7fe3ae.desc:
(update)
Loads the next or previous playlist entry if there are no more chapters in the seek direction.

github:occivink/mpv-scripts#blur-edgeslu.name: blur-edges
github:occivink/mpv-scripts#blur-edgeslu.desc: Replace black bars with a blurry copy of the video
github:occivink/mpv-scripts#blur-edgeslu.install-notes: The script defines a toggle-blur command that you can bind.

github:NurioHin/mpv-bookmarker.name: bookmarker-menu
github:NurioHin/mpv-bookmarker.desc: A bookmarker menu to manage all your bookmarks in MPV, based on mpv-bookmarker but with a menu

github:sorayuki-winter/mpv-plugin-bookma.name: bookmark
github:sorayuki-winter/mpv-plugin-bookma.desc: Record and resume last play in current playing folder

gist:bitingsock/1e7ef04a151963b38e347a72.name: channel mixer
gist:bitingsock/1e7ef04a151963b38e347a72.desc: A set of keybindings using a modifier (Shift or Ctrl) and the function keys (F8-F12) to can adjust the mixing level of surround channels on the fly.

github:po5/chapterskip.name: chapterskip
github:po5/chapterskip.desc: Automatically skip chapters based on title.

github:Ares-0/mpv-composition-guides.name: composition guides
github:Ares-0/mpv-composition-guides.desc: Overlay basic composition guides onto your video.

github:Arieleg/mpv-copyTime/copyTime.name: copyTime
github:Arieleg/mpv-copyTime/copyTime.desc: Get the current time of the video and copy it to the clipboard with the format HH:MM:SS.MS .

github:Arieleg/mpv-copyTime-2.name: copyTime
github:Arieleg/mpv-copyTime-2.desc: Get the current time of the video and copy it to the clipboard with the format HH:MM:SS.MS .

gist:avih/bee746200b5712220b8bd2f230e535.name: Tcl/Tk context menu
gist:avih/bee746200b5712220b8bd2f230e535.desc: Configurable context-menu based on Tcl/Tk, for *nix/Windows and probably macOS too.

gist:Zehkul/25ea7ae77b30af959be0.name: convert_script
gist:Zehkul/25ea7ae77b30af959be0.desc: Script to quickly convert and crop videos from within mpv, with a GUI.

github:CogentRedTester/mpv-coverart.name: coverart
github:CogentRedTester/mpv-coverart.desc: Automatically load external music cover art

gist:olejorgenb/a5194d9bc183dbe0bfb02aac.name: copy-permalink
gist:olejorgenb/a5194d9bc183dbe0bfb02aac.desc: Copy mpv --time=<current-position> <path-playing> to clipboard. Useful for sharing when playing URLs.

github:occivink/mpv-scripts#croplua.name: crop
github:occivink/mpv-scripts#croplua.desc: Crop the video by defining the target rectangle with the cursor

gitlab:mozbugbox/mpv-script-mozbugbox/cl.name: clock
gitlab:mozbugbox/mpv-script-mozbugbox/cl.desc: Constantly show current time on the lower left corner of the video screen.

gitlab:mozbugbox/mpv-script-mozbugbox/cu.name: curvesman
gitlab:mozbugbox/mpv-script-mozbugbox/cu.desc: Manipulate color curves filter of FFmpeg with hotkeys. Brighten up color, change color temperature/tone, hopefully more. Adjust yellow light tone to white light tone.

gist:bitingsock/ad58ee5da560ecb922fa4a86.name: cycle-audio-device
gist:bitingsock/ad58ee5da560ecb922fa4a86.desc: Cycle through available audio devices with key binds.

github:mpv-player/mpv/cycle-deinterlace-.name: cycle-deinterlace-pullup
github:mpv-player/mpv/cycle-deinterlace-.desc: Cycle between deinterlacing, pullup (IVTC), and both filters off.

gist:myfreeer/d744c445aa71c0eeb165ca39cf.name: cycle-denoise
gist:myfreeer/d744c445aa71c0eeb165ca39cf.desc: Cycle between lavfi's denoise filters (press n)

github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/auto-ke.name: auto-keep-gui-open
github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/auto-ke.desc: Intelligently switches mpv's "keep-open" behavior based on whether you are running in video-mode or audio-only mode.

github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/cycle-v.name: cycle-video-rotate
github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/cycle-v.desc: Allows you to perform video rotation which perfectly cycles through all 360 degrees without any glitches.

github:demanuel/dessubdb/mpv.lua.name: dessubdb
github:demanuel/dessubdb/mpv.lua.desc: Download automatically subtitles from the thesubdb.com using DESSubdb.

github:nimatrueway/mpv-locatefile-lua-sc.name: locate-file
github:nimatrueway/mpv-locatefile-lua-sc.desc: Locate current media file on your OS file browser

github:b4zz4/mpv-delogo.name: delogo
github:b4zz4/mpv-delogo.desc:
*** deprecated according to project page. tested and does not work.
It removes the logo of the channels in a video (press n)

github:b4zz4/mpv-deframe.name: deframe
github:b4zz4/mpv-deframe.desc: It removes the frame of youtube videos (press g)

gist:richardpl/0c8011dc23d7ac7b7831b2e6d.name: drcbox
gist:richardpl/0c8011dc23d7ac7b7831b2e6d.desc: Dynamic Audio Normalizer filter with visual feedback.

github:aidanholm/mpv-easycrop.name: easycrop
github:aidanholm/mpv-easycrop.desc: Manually crop a video during playback.

github:occivink/mpv-scripts#encodelua.name: encode
github:occivink/mpv-scripts#encodelua.desc: Re-encode or remux part of the current video. Can also preserve some filters, such as "crop".

gitlab:lvml/mpv-plugin-excerpt.name: excerpt
gitlab:lvml/mpv-plugin-excerpt.desc: Allows you to quickly create excerpts from media files, you just have to set begin and end markers.

github:zc62/mpv-scripts/exit-fullscreen..name: exit-fullscreen
github:zc62/mpv-scripts/exit-fullscreen..desc: If you use --keep-open=yes, this script exits fullscreen mode when the playback reaches the end of file/playlist.

github:jgreco/mpv-scripts/fastforward.lu.name: fastforward
github:jgreco/mpv-scripts/fastforward.lu.desc: Instead of skipping forward in media files, speed up the playback for a few seconds.  Playback speed decays back to 1x after a few seconds.  Tap rapidly or hold down to go faster.

github:zsugabubus/mpv-fastforward.name: fast-forward
github:zsugabubus/mpv-fastforward.desc: Another fast-forward plugin with some added features and a bit more customization options.

github:jonniek/mpv-filenavigator.name: filenavigator
github:jonniek/mpv-filenavigator.desc: Navigate directories and open files from your system.

gitlab:mozbugbox/mpv-script-mozbugbox.name: filter-test
gitlab:mozbugbox/mpv-script-mozbugbox.desc: Test mpv/FFmpeg video filter(vf) strings with editable popup dialog.

github:directorscut82/find_subtitles.name: find_subtitles
github:directorscut82/find_subtitles.install-notes: subliminal (version 1.0.1+) must be installed and in PATH.

github:mfcc64/mpv-scripts/firequalizer15.name: firequalizer15
github:mfcc64/mpv-scripts/firequalizer15.install-notes: Note that ~~/lua-settings directory should exist to save gain values.

github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/fix-sub-timin.name: fix_sub_timing
github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/fix-sub-timin.desc: Compute the correct speed/delay of subtitles by manually synching two points in time.

github:AN3223/dotfiles/force-window-prof.name: force-window-profile
github:AN3223/dotfiles/force-window-prof.desc: Applies the force-window profile when force-window is set (i.e. when starting mpv from the .desktop file)

github:haasn/gentoo-conf/fpsadjust.lua.name: fpsadjust
github:haasn/gentoo-conf/fpsadjust.lua.desc:
Automatically adjust playback speed to synchronize the video to the display if possible (eg. by adjusting 23.976 Hz to 24 Hz for better compatibility with a 60 Hz display).
Obsolete: mpv now has a native display-sync option.

github:dya-tel/mpv-scripts/blackout.name: blackout
github:dya-tel/mpv-scripts/blackout.desc: A fast crossplatfrom boss-key, but without window minimization (and possible problems with some VO drivers).

github:dya-tel/mpv-scripts/fuzzydir.name: fuzzydir
github:dya-tel/mpv-scripts/fuzzydir.desc: Allows using wildcards for sub-file-paths and audio-file-paths.

github:jgreco/mpv-scripts/gallery-dl_hoo.name: gallery-dl_hook
github:jgreco/mpv-scripts/gallery-dl_hoo.install-notes: to use, prepend the gallery url with: gallery-dl://
github:jgreco/mpv-scripts/gallery-dl_hoo.desc: Load online image galleries (imgur, etc) as playlists using gallery-dl.

github:CounterPillow/mpv-gpufreq.name: gpufreq
github:CounterPillow/mpv-gpufreq.desc: Show current and maximum GPU frequencies for GPUs using the DRM stack on Linux.

github:po5/groupwatch_sync.name: groupwatch_sync
github:po5/groupwatch_sync.desc: Quickly get back in sync with a group watch by adjusting playback speed.

github:detuur/mpv-scripts/boss-key.name: boss-key
github:detuur/mpv-scripts/boss-key.desc: Minimise and pause video at the same time. Windows/Linux. Eliminated the time lag in previous versions.

github:detuur/mpv-scripts/histogram.name: histogram
github:detuur/mpv-scripts/histogram.desc: Exposes a configurable way to overlay ffmpeg histograms in mpv. There is a substantial amount of config available.

gist:ntasos/d1d846abd7d25e4e83a78d22ee06.name: KDialog-open-files
gist:ntasos/d1d846abd7d25e4e83a78d22ee06.desc: Use KDE's KDialog to add files to playlist, subtitles to playing video or open URLs.

github:occivink/mpv-image-viewer/drag-to.name: drag-to-pan
github:occivink/mpv-image-viewer/drag-to.desc: Pan the current video or image with the cursor.

github:occivink/mpv-image-viewer/image-v.name: image-viewer
github:occivink/mpv-image-viewer/image-v.desc: Configurations, scripts and tips for using mpv as an image viewer.

github:mosquito-byte/mpv-interactive-vid.name: interactive-video
github:mosquito-byte/mpv-interactive-vid.desc: Script for watching interactive videos (such as Netflix's Black Mirror: Bandersnatch).

github:oltodosel/interSubs.name: interSubs
github:oltodosel/interSubs.desc: Interactive subtitles. Instantly translate selected word/sentence. Works on Linux, macOS.

github:l29ah/w3crapcli/mpv-lastfm.lua.name: last.fm scrobbler
github:l29ah/w3crapcli/mpv-lastfm.lua.desc: Sends the information about playing tracks to last.fm, see http://www.last.fm/help/faq?category=99 for more info.

github:po5/libass_sub_selector.name: libass_sub_selector
github:po5/libass_sub_selector.desc: Visually select individual subtitles a la PotPlayer.

github:hdb/mpv-live-filters.name: live-filters
github:hdb/mpv-live-filters.desc: Add, remove or toggle ffmpeg video filters during mpv playback.

github:422658476/MPV-EASY-Player/local-l.name: local-language
github:422658476/MPV-EASY-Player/local-l.desc: Let the text displayed by mpv osd become the language you are most familiar with, that is, language localization, such as 【volume: 100%】 becomes 【音量:100%】.

github:sbruder/mpv-matroska-crop.name: matroska-crop
github:sbruder/mpv-matroska-crop.desc: Automatically crop video using the Matroska PixelCrop properties. Includes optional workaround for hardware decoding.

github:thebombzen/scripts/markchapter.lu.name: mark-chapter
github:thebombzen/scripts/markchapter.lu.install-notes: usage at input.conf, add e.g. "M script_message mark-chapter"
github:thebombzen/scripts/markchapter.lu.desc: Temporarily mark the current playback position as a chapter so you can seek to it later. Don't forget to edit input.conf to give it a keybinding.

github:shinchiro/mpv-createchapter.name: createchapter
github:shinchiro/mpv-createchapter.desc: Similar as mark-chapter but with ability to export valid xml file.

github:hoehermann/mpv-mpegts-truncate.name: mpegts-truncate
github:hoehermann/mpv-mpegts-truncate.desc: Removes beginning of MPEG TS file up to current position without re-writing the whole file.

github:Digitalone1/mpv-acestream.name: mpv-acestream
github:Digitalone1/mpv-acestream.desc: Add AceStream protocol handler to mpv. Let the user open streams by dropping Acestream links into mpv GUI or by passing them as command line argument.

github:fatihkaan22/mpv-bluetooth-av-dela.name: mpv-bluetooth-av-delay
github:fatihkaan22/mpv-bluetooth-av-dela.desc: Adds desired A-V delay automatically, if default audio sink is a bluetooth device.

github:nimatrueway/mpv-bookmark-lua-scri.name: mpv-bookmarker
github:nimatrueway/mpv-bookmark-lua-scri.desc: Bookmark your favorite time on media files

github:Samillion/mpv-boxtowide.name: mpv-BoxToWide
github:Samillion/mpv-boxtowide.desc: A simple mpv script to change 4:3 aspect-ratio of video files/streams to 16:9 automatically.

github:nmoorthy1/mpv-Change-OSD-Media-Ti.name: mpv-Change-OSD-Media-Title
github:nmoorthy1/mpv-Change-OSD-Media-Ti.desc: Displays filename, percentage watched, current chapter, and number of frames dropped in the OSD media title and updates it whenever one of the values has changed.

github:TheAMM/mpv_crop_script.name: mpv_crop_script
github:TheAMM/mpv_crop_script.desc: Take cropped screenshots directly within mpv, without the need for external dependencies.

github:noaione/mpv-discordRPC.name: mpv_discordRPC
github:noaione/mpv-discordRPC.desc: Discord RPC integration for mpv using lua-discordRPC as base.

github:cniw/mpv-discordRPC.name: mpv_discordRPC
github:cniw/mpv-discordRPC.desc:
(alternative version)
Discord Rich Presence integration for mpv Media Player. Added some features and support: Linux, MacOS and Windows.

github:Kagami/mpv_frame_info.name: mpv_frame_info
github:Kagami/mpv_frame_info.desc: Show frame info, similar to ffdshow's OSD.

gist:garoto/e0eb539b210ee077c980e01fb2da.name: mpv-history
gist:garoto/e0eb539b210ee077c980e01fb2da.desc: Simple played media logger. Will generate a mpvhistory.log in the default mpv config folder (%APPDATA%/mpv/ or $HOME/.config/mpv/) in the format [$DATE $TIME] $PATH ($?MEDIA-TITLE). Only tested on Windows.

github:mdnghtman/mpv-i3-floating-centere.name: mpv-i3-floating-centered
github:mdnghtman/mpv-i3-floating-centere.desc: Show mpv window in the center of the display when it is in floating mode (i3wm)

github:po5/mpv_manager.name: mpv_manager
github:po5/mpv_manager.desc: User script and shader manager for mpv

github:Dudemanguy911/mpv-manga-reader/ma.name: mpv-manga-reader
github:Dudemanguy911/mpv-manga-reader/ma.desc: Script for using mpv as a manga reader.

github:Zren/mpv-osc-tethys.name: mpv-osc-tethys
github:Zren/mpv-osc-tethys.desc: An OSC UI replacement for MPV with icons from the bomi video player. Also contains thumbnail preview and a picture-in-picture button.
github:Zren/mpv-osc-tethys.install-notes:
Note: Because this script replaces the built-in OSC, you will have to set osc=no in your mpv's main config file.
See the scripts site for configuration options:
https://github.com/Zren/mpv-osc-tethys

github:jgreco/mpv-pdf.name: mpv-pdf
github:jgreco/mpv-pdf.desc: View PDFs in mpv using ImageMagick.   Supports: Linux, MacOS

github:po5/mpv_irc.name: mpv_irc
github:po5/mpv_irc.desc: Display lines from an IRC channel or any text file.

github:po5/mpv_sponsorblock.name: sponsorblock
github:po5/mpv_sponsorblock.desc: Script to skip sponsored segments of YouTube videos.

github:Samillion/mpv-ytdlautoformat.name: mpv-ytdlAutoFormat
github:Samillion/mpv-ytdlautoformat.desc: A simple mpv LUA script to auto change ytdl-format for Youtube and Twitch or the domains you desire, to 480p or the quality you desire.

github:SenneH/mpv2anki.name: mpv2anki
github:SenneH/mpv2anki.desc: A simple way to add notes to Anki with Audio, screenshots and/or subtitles, with few dependencies.

github:wis/mpvSockets.name: mpvSockets
github:wis/mpvSockets.desc: creates one IPC sockets per mpv instance, instead of one socket for the last started instance.   Supports: Linux, MacOS and Windows.

github:TheAMM/mpv_sort_script.name: mpv_sort_script
github:TheAMM/mpv_sort_script.desc: Sort files and directories by name, age, size or randomly, recursively or when coming across a directory.

github:Kagami/mpv_slicing.name: mpv_slicing
github:Kagami/mpv_slicing.desc: Cut uncompressed fragments of the video.

github:snylonue/mpv_slicing_copy.name: mpv_slicing_copying
github:snylonue/mpv_slicing_copy.desc: A fork from mpv_slicing. It will cut fragments of the video in original format instead of RGB

github:TheAMM/mpv_thumbnail_script.name: mpv_thumbnail_script
github:TheAMM/mpv_thumbnail_script.desc: Show preview thumbnails when hovering over the seekbar, without the need for external dependencies.
github:TheAMM/mpv_thumbnail_script.install-notes:
Note: Because this script replaces the built-in OSC, you will have to set osc=no in your mpv's main config file.
See the scripts site for configuration options:
https://github.com/TheAMM/mpv_thumbnail_script

github:jgreco/mpv-txt.name: mpv-txt
github:jgreco/mpv-txt.desc: Play text files using text-to-speech (TTS). (Works on Linux, MacOS; see Dependencies).

gitlab:derobert/mpv-volnorm.name: mpv-volnorm
gitlab:derobert/mpv-volnorm.desc: Client-server setup to provide EBU R.128 volume leveling to MPV, even if files stored on a server and played on multiple machines. (Works on Linux, probably all Unix-like; server in Perl).

gitlab:carmanaught/mpvcontextmenu.name: mpvcontextmenu
gitlab:carmanaught/mpvcontextmenu.desc: Comprehensive context-menu forked from Tcl/Tk context menu. Uses other scripts (see Requirements).

github:nezumisama/mpvmenu.name: mpvmenu
github:nezumisama/mpvmenu.desc: Adds a pop-up menu to mpv, which can be bound to a key or button

github:unusualpepe/mpv-multiloop.name: multiloop
github:unusualpepe/mpv-multiloop.desc: Loop over multiple A-B points (and save them for future use)

github:AN3223/dotfiles/multisocket.lua.name: multisocket
github:AN3223/dotfiles/multisocket.lua.desc: Creates a numbered socket for each instance of mpv

github:gim-/mpv-plugin-myshows.name: myshows
github:gim-/mpv-plugin-myshows.install-notes:
Lua dependency luasocket is required.
Also you need to manually create a configuration file for this plugin and add your MyShows credentials to it.
See README file for details.
github:gim-/mpv-plugin-myshows.desc: Marks currently watched episode on MyShows website.

github:jonniek/mpv-nextfile.name: nextfile
github:jonniek/mpv-nextfile.desc: Force opens next or previous file in the currently playing files directory.

github:rohieb/mpv-notify.name: notify
github:rohieb/mpv-notify.desc: Adds desktop notifications to the mpv media player, which show metadata like artist, album name and track name when the track changes.

github:emilazy/mpv-notify-send.name: notify-send
github:emilazy/mpv-notify-send.desc: A simpler and more recent notifications script for libnotify-compatible (i.e. Unix-like) notifications daemons only. Supports cover art.

github:Akemi/mpv-oled-screensaver.name: oled-screensaver
github:Akemi/mpv-oled-screensaver.desc: To prevent burn-ins on OLED TVs, this script fades-in a black screen after 15 seconds when paused in fullscreen.

github:mpv-player/mpv/ontop-playback.lua.name: ontop-playback
github:mpv-player/mpv/ontop-playback.lua.desc: Disables the ontop property when pausing, and enables it again when unpausing the video, if it was disabled. Change it only when the player is not in fullscreen to prevent screen flickering.

github:kungfubeaner/mpv-ontop-only-while.name: ontop-only-while-playing
github:kungfubeaner/mpv-ontop-only-while.desc:
Ontop is only active during video playback. Ontop is automatically disabled during idle, pause and is able
to be dynamically disabled without having to restart unlike the previous script.

github:ctlaltdefeat/mpv-open-imdb-page.name: open-imdb-page
github:ctlaltdefeat/mpv-open-imdb-page.desc: Opens the IMDb page that corresponds to the currently playing media file.

github:WANDEX/mpv-open-kinopoisk-page.name: open-kinopoisk-page
github:WANDEX/mpv-open-kinopoisk-page.desc: Opens the kinopoisk page that corresponds to the currently playing media file.

github:rossy/mpv-open-file-dialog.name: open-file-dialog
github:rossy/mpv-open-file-dialog.desc: (Windows) Launches a regular Windows file open dialog for loading videos.

github:422658476/MPV-EASY-Player/osc-sty.name: osc-style
github:422658476/MPV-EASY-Player/osc-sty.desc: Change the mpv osc to a more beautiful and practical look, which is the osc theme feature, a variety of styles to choose from,this is a tutorial and a preview.

github:422658476/MPV-EASY-Player/osd-bar.name: osd-bar
github:422658476/MPV-EASY-Player/osd-bar.desc: Always show osd progress bar, with the more beautiful color matching in the configuration file, you can make the osd progress bar display the current progress at the bottom of the window beautifully,this is a preview.

github:blue-sky-r/mpv/osd-clock.lua.name: osd-clock
github:blue-sky-r/mpv/osd-clock.lua.desc: Periodically shows OSD clock (many configurable options).

gist:torque/9dbc69543118347d2e5f43239a7e.name: pause-indicator
gist:torque/9dbc69543118347d2e5f43239a7e.desc: Displays a momentary icon that flashes in the middle of the screen, similar to YouTube.

github:mpv-player/mpv/pause-when-minimiz.name: pause-when-minimize
github:mpv-player/mpv/pause-when-minimiz.desc: Pauses the player video when minimizing, and unpauses it when brought up again.

gist:ekisu/bba287693830055a6bad90081c1ad.name: peerflix-hook
gist:ekisu/bba287693830055a6bad90081c1ad.desc: Allows streaming of magnet links using peerflix, similar to youtube-dl.

github:noctuid/mpv-peerflix-hook.name: mpv-peerflix-hook
github:noctuid/mpv-peerflix-hook.desc: Alternate version of the above gist that works with multiple running peerflix instances and only kills the correct peerflix instance when exiting.

github:noctuid/mpv-webtorrent-hook.name: webtorrent-hook
github:noctuid/mpv-webtorrent-hook.desc: Allows streaming torrents using webtorrent (same as mpv-peerflix-hook but using webtorrent instead). Webtorrent-cli can play in mpv, but this script allows using torrent identifiers as the file argument to mpv or pasting them into the current playlist using one of the pasting scripts listed here.

github:d87/mpv-persist-properties.name: persist-properties
github:d87/mpv-persist-properties.desc: Keeps volume and other properties between sessions

github:FichteFoll/mpv-scripts/pitchcontr.name: pitchcontrol
github:FichteFoll/mpv-scripts/pitchcontr.desc: Adjusts audio pitch in half-tone steps.

github:jonniek/mpv-playlistmanager.name: playlistmanager
github:jonniek/mpv-playlistmanager.desc: This script allows you to see and interact with your playlist in an intuitive way.

github:422658476/MPV-EASY-Player/playlis.name: playlistnoplayback
github:422658476/MPV-EASY-Player/playlis.desc: If you enable the save play history and progress function, this lua script can solve the problem of automatically jumping to the previous playback progress when playing the next file when playing the playlist, that is, let the playlist always play the next file from the beginning every time. the limitations of this script, please see the comments section in the content.

github:occivink/mpv-gallery-view/contact.name: contact-sheet
github:occivink/mpv-gallery-view/contact.desc: Display thumbnails of the current file in the style of a contact sheet

github:occivink/mpv-gallery-view/playlis.name: playlist-view
github:occivink/mpv-gallery-view/playlis.desc: Display and navigate the playlist in a grid view of thumbnails.

github:torque/mpv-progressbar.name: progressbar
github:torque/mpv-progressbar.desc: A minimalistic OSC replacement. It provides a small, unintrusive progress bar that persists at the bottom of the video window.

github:CounterPillow/mpv-quack.name: quack
github:CounterPillow/mpv-quack.desc: Temporarily lower the volume after a seek to save your ears from unpleasant sudden volume changes.

github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/multi-c.name: multi-command-if
github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/multi-c.desc: Very powerful conditional logic and multiple action engine for your keybindings, without having to write a single line of code!

github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/quick-s.name: quick-scale
github:VideoPlayerCode/mpv-tools/quick-s.desc: Quickly scale the video player to a target size, with full control over target scale and max scale. Helps you effortlessly resize a video to fit on your desktop, or any other video dimensions you need!

github:olivierlemoal/mpv-radio-title-scr.name: radio-title
github:olivierlemoal/mpv-radio-title-scr.desc: Automatically fetch current playing title from webradio website when not provided by stream.

github:hacel/mpv-scripts.name: recent
github:hacel/mpv-scripts.desc: Recently played menu using a history log file in config directory, display using a hotkey or automatically when idle.

repo.or.cz:redshift_toggle.lua.name: redshift_toggle
repo.or.cz:redshift_toggle.lua.desc: Toggle redshift when loading a video file and when reaching the end of said file.

gist:CreamyCookie/d036b66af4e17ea527d08e.name: toggle-redshift-on-play
gist:CreamyCookie/d036b66af4e17ea527d08e.desc: Based on the above one, this one also re-enables redshift when pausing and disables it again when unpausing.

github:4e6/mpv-reload.name: reload
github:4e6/mpv-reload.desc: When an online video is stuck during buffering or got slow CDN source, restarting often helps. This script provides automatic reloading of videos that didn't have buffering progress for some time, keeping the current time position. It also adds Ctrl+r keybinding to reload video manually.

github:rossy/mpv-repl.name: repl
github:rossy/mpv-repl.desc: A REPL for input commands that is displayed on the video window.

github:jgreco/mpv-scripts/rubberband_hel.name: rubberband_helper
github:jgreco/mpv-scripts/rubberband_hel.desc: rubberband is great for keeping voices intelligible when the video playback is speed up, but it consumes a fair amount of CPU.  This script allows you to degrade the audio filter back to scaletempo when playback speeds are high enough to make rubberband pointless.  Note: mpv must be built with rubberband support; see mpv --af=rubberband=help

github:zc62/mpv-scripts/save-sub-delay.l.name: save-sub-delay
github:zc62/mpv-scripts/save-sub-delay.l.desc: This script saves the sub-delay quantity for each file. When next time the file is opened, sub-delay is automatically restored.

github:occivink/mpv-scripts#seek-tolua.name: seek-to
github:occivink/mpv-scripts#seek-tolua.desc: Seek to an absolute timestamp specified via keyboard input.

gist:garoto/920b7456d2bdd8f48aa8e7094a12.name: scale-win
gist:garoto/920b7456d2bdd8f48aa8e7094a12.desc: Restore old "window-scale" behavior, so to make "add window-scale +/-" keybinds work again when any of the autofit-* options are defined.

github:yuukidach/mpv-scripts/history-boo.name: history-bookmark
github:yuukidach/mpv-scripts/history-boo.desc: Create a history file to store the episode we watched last time. And let us easily jump to the video we watched last time.

github:yuukidach/mpv-scripts/show-filena.name: show-filename
github:yuukidach/mpv-scripts/show-filena.desc: Show the name of the current playing file.

github:blue-sky-r/mpv/show-stream-title..name: show-stream-title
github:blue-sky-r/mpv/show-stream-title..install-notes:
To customize configuration place show-stream-title.conf template into
dir ~/.config/mpv/script-opts/ [~/.config/mpv/lua-settings/] and edit

Place script into ~/.config/mpv/scripts/ for autoload

OSD options like duration, alignment, border, scale could be set in ~/.config/mpv/mpv.conf
github:blue-sky-r/mpv/show-stream-title..desc: Show OSD stream/channel title when switching the IPTV channels from m3u playlist.

github:fhlfibh/simple-loader.name: simple-loader
github:fhlfibh/simple-loader.desc: (Linux) Browse dirs and files on OSD, and launch them with mpv.

github:haasn/gentoo-conf/skipchapters.lu.name: skipchapters
github:haasn/gentoo-conf/skipchapters.lu.desc: Automatically skip chapters matching a given list of regular expressions (eg. "OP" or "Opening").

gist:bossen/3cfe86a6cdd61452dbb96865128f.name: skiptofade
gist:bossen/3cfe86a6cdd61452dbb96865128f.desc: Seeks forward until a black screen appears. Built to skip openings. Uses the lavfi blackdetect filter.

github:detuur/mpv-scripts.name: skiptosilence
github:detuur/mpv-scripts.desc: This script skips to the next silence in the file. The intended use for this is to skip until the end of an opening or ending sequence, at which point there's often a short period of silence.

github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#smartcopypaste.name: SmartCopyPaste
github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#smartcopypaste.desc: Powerful copy paste features. Paste URL or local videos directly to mpv. Copy URL or currently playing video in mpv player then paste to access at a later time. Add videos to playlist simply by pasting. Much more explained in the link above.

github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#smartcopypaste.name: SmartCopyPaste-II
github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#smartcopypaste.desc: Powerful copy paste and bookmark features using a log file; log file location for Windows OS: %APPDATA%\mpv\mpvClipboard.log, for Linux OS and MAC OS: ~\.config\mpv\mpvClipboard.log. Paste URL or local videos directly to mpv. Copy URL or currently playing video in mpv player then paste to access at a later time. Bookmark video and its time by copying then paste to access bookmark. Much more explained in the link above.

github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#smarthistory-s.name: SmartHistory
github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#smarthistory-s.desc: Powerful history features that logs videos that you opened into a log file along with the time you have reached on each video; log file location for Windows OS: %APPDATA%\mpv\mpvHistory.log, for Linux OS and MAC OS: ~\.config\mpv\mpvHistory.log. Optional resume by [ctrl]+[r] for all videos you have played (auto bookmark). Immediately play last opened video by [ctrl]+[l]. Much more explained in the link above.

github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#simpleundo-scr.name: SimpleUndo
github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#simpleundo-scr.desc: Simple undo feature. If you accidentally seek/jump to a different time in the video, press undo [ctrl]+[z] to return to your previous time and vice-versa. More details in the link above.

github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#undoredo-scrip.name: UndoRedo
github:Eisa01/mpv-scripts#undoredo-scrip.desc: Undo and Redo feature for mpv.  If you seek/jump to a different time in the video, press undo [ctrl]+[z] to linearly undo the seeks/jumps in the video, and press redo [ctrl]+[y] to linearly return to previous undo positions. More details in the link above.

github:zenyd/mpv-scripts/delete-file.name: delete-file
github:zenyd/mpv-scripts/delete-file.desc: Provides the ability to delete files being played through mpv

github:zenyd/mpv-scripts/speed-transitio.name: speed-transition
github:zenyd/mpv-scripts/speed-transitio.desc: Increases playback speed if a subtitle will not be displayed soon. Resumes normal speed just before the subtitle shows up.

gist:bitingsock/e8a56446ad9c1ed92d872aeb.name: speed-transition-Audio
gist:bitingsock/e8a56446ad9c1ed92d872aeb.desc: Experiment similar to speed-transition. changes playback speed based on volume thresholds.

github:oltodosel/mpv-scripts#speedlua.name: speed
github:oltodosel/mpv-scripts#speedlua.desc: Changing speed based on regex of filename/path.

github:vflorelle/mpv-scripts#speed.name: speed
github:vflorelle/mpv-scripts#speed.desc: Always show current playback speed on the OSD

github:pvpscript/mpv-video-splice.name: splice
github:pvpscript/mpv-video-splice.desc: A script that helps you create a video out of cuts made in the current playing video.

github:olivierlemoal/mpv-spotify-script.name: spotify
github:olivierlemoal/mpv-spotify-script.desc: Add current playing title to an user defined Spotify playlist.

github:vflorelle/mpv-scripts#sub.name: sub
github:vflorelle/mpv-scripts#sub.desc: Select subtitle by id via input box (Windows)

github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/subit.lua.name: subit
github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/subit.lua.install-notes:
Requirements:
- Python 2/3, installed or embedded
- subliminal (python script)
- if Windows, python's Script in PATH or change 'path'
  to absolute path of subliminal.exe
github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/subit.lua.desc: Yet another script for downloading subtitles using subliminal. Supports better customization of options, such as easy language selection, authentication for providers that need it, and support for URLs.

github:zenyd/mpv-scripts.name: subselect Tk
github:zenyd/mpv-scripts.desc: Download subtitles with a GUI - select the one you want and automatically load them up in mpv. Supports searching for arbitrary names and different subtitle languages. Works on Windows and Linux, possibly macOS.

gist.github.com:f2c272fb7c77cf834cf06190.name: subside
gist.github.com:f2c272fb7c77cf834cf06190.desc: make subtitles go in a browser window (linux only)

github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-cut.lua.name: sub-cut
github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-cut.lua.desc: Extract a part of the video as audio or video with subtitles.

github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-bookmark.name: sub-bookmarks
github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-bookmark.desc: Save current position and subtitles in .txt file.

github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-export.l.name: sub-export
github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-export.l.install-notes:
Requires FFmpeg in PATH environment variable or edit ffmpeg_path in the script options,
for example, by replacing [[ffmpeg]] with [[C:\Programs\ffmpeg\bin\ffmpeg.exe]]

github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-playback.name: sub-playback
github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-playback.desc: Add interactive move, i.e. automatically pause at the end of the fragment with option to continue playback or replay it again with or without subtitles.

github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-search.l.name: sub-search
github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/sub-search.l.desc: Search for phrase in subtitles and skip to it.

github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/subs2srs.lua.name: subs2srs
github:kelciour/mpv-scripts/subs2srs.lua.desc: Automatically add new card in Anki with audio, picture and text.

github:Argon-/mpv-stats.name: stats
github:Argon-/mpv-stats.desc: Display some statistics about the currently played file on-screen.

gitlab:lvml/mpv-plugin-streamcache.name: streamcache
gitlab:lvml/mpv-plugin-streamcache.desc: Provides for more network-glitch-robust caching of live streams by adjusting replay speed.

github:mustaqimM/mpv-scripts/time.lua.name: time
github:mustaqimM/mpv-scripts/time.lua.desc: Shows the current time or the time at which playback will end.

github:AdamD2/mpv-timer.name: timer
github:AdamD2/mpv-timer.desc: Allows the user to set a starting time and an ending time and see the time elapsed between those points with millisecond precision.

github:po5/trackselect.name: trackselect
github:po5/trackselect.desc: Automatically select your preferred tracks based on title.

github:fbriere/mpv-scripts/tree-profiles.name: tree-profiles
github:fbriere/mpv-scripts/tree-profiles.desc: Automatically apply profiles to certain directories or files.

github:aerobounce/trim.lua.name: trim.lua
github:aerobounce/trim.lua.desc: Create a trim of video files without transcoding. Utilizes ffprobe to fetch accurate keyframes.

github:oltodosel/mpv-scripts/total_playt.name: total_playtime
github:oltodosel/mpv-scripts/total_playt.desc: Shows total playtime of current playlist.

github:fullmetalsheep/mpv-iina-scripts.name: trueautosub
github:fullmetalsheep/mpv-iina-scripts.desc: Improved fork of autosub, Automatically downloads subtitles if not present using subliminal. (osx/linux only)

github:jgreco/mpv-scripts/tts-subs.lua.name: tts-subs
github:jgreco/mpv-scripts/tts-subs.lua.desc: Use voice synthesis to read subtitles out-loud (Currently uses say on MacOS.  Could be adapted to use espeak.  PR for windows support welcome.)

github:blue-sky-r/mpv/tv.lua.name: tv-output
github:blue-sky-r/mpv/tv.lua.desc: (Linux) TV output handling - activate on mpv playback and deactivate on mpv shutdown.

github:donmaiq/unseen-playlistmaker.name: unseen-playlistmaker
github:donmaiq/unseen-playlistmaker.desc: Keeps track of watched files locally, and creates playlists of unwatched files.

github:darsain/uosc.name: uosc
github:darsain/uosc.desc: Minimalist proximity based UI replacement. Video preview.

gist:ekisu/04924e899648e84f2e18.name: vo_battery
gist:ekisu/04924e899648e84f2e18.desc: (Linux) Choose the VO based on if the laptop is on battery or not.

github:dfaker/VR-reversal.name: vr-reversal
github:dfaker/VR-reversal.desc: View 3D side-by-side video as a 2D video, allows you to look around and zoom within the video, logs the head motions to a file for later rendering out to a 2D video with ffmpeg.

github:ekisu/mpv-webm.name: webm
github:ekisu/mpv-webm.desc: Simple WebM maker for mpv, with no external dependencies.

github:AN3223/dotfiles/when-to-loop.lua.name: when-to-loop
github:AN3223/dotfiles/when-to-loop.lua.desc: Intelligently decide when mpv should loop, i.e. while shuffling or while playing a short file.

gitlab:lvml/mpv-plugin-xrandr.name: xrandr
gitlab:lvml/mpv-plugin-xrandr.desc: Automatically sets the display refresh rate to the one best suitable for the video played

github:laelnasan/yomichampv.name: Yomichampv
github:laelnasan/yomichampv.desc: A simple solution for integration with Yomichan - a browser-based japanese dictionay.

github:jgreco/mpv-youtube-quality.name: youtube-quality
github:jgreco/mpv-youtube-quality.desc: A menu for changing youtube video quality (ytdl-format) on the fly, as though you were using the web player.

github:cvzi/mpv-youtube-upnext.name: youtube-upnext
github:cvzi/mpv-youtube-upnext.desc: A menu for (auto) playing youtube's "up next"/recommended videos, that show up on the right side on the website.

gist:bitingsock/f9a87ea158035d4a36899b55.name: ytdl prefetch resolver
gist:bitingsock/f9a87ea158035d4a36899b55.desc: Resolves the next url in the playlist using ytdl before the current file reaches the end. Using --prefetch-playlist along side this it allows i.e. youtube data to begin loading into cache ahead of time.

github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/zones.lua.name: zones
github:wiiaboo/mpv-scripts/zones.lua.desc: Handles commands depending on where the mouse pointer is at, mostly for mouse wheel handling.

github:Thann/mpv-abs-screenshot/abs-scre.name: abs-screenshot
github:Thann/mpv-abs-screenshot/abs-scre.desc: Uses Exiftool to get the "Date/Time Original" and saves a screenshot with the name being the actual time the video was taken.

github:devnikor/mpv-conf/addfile.lua.name: addfile
github:devnikor/mpv-conf/addfile.lua.desc: (OS X) Add subtitle or audio track to playing video file

github:bloc97/Anime4K.name: Anime4K
github:bloc97/Anime4K.desc: A series of shaders designed to scale and enhance anime. Includes shaders for line sharpening, artefact removal, denoising, upscaling, and more.

gist:voltmtr/8b4404b4e23129b226b9e64863d.name: LumaSharpenHook
gist:voltmtr/8b4404b4e23129b226b9e64863d.desc: A sharpen filter similar to using Unsharp Mask in Photoshop ported from SweetFX shader pack.

gist.github.com:igv.name: SSimDownscaler, SSimSuperRes, Krig, Adaptive Sharpen, etc.

github:haasn/gentoo-conf/noise.glsl.name: Noise
github:haasn/gentoo-conf/noise.glsl.desc: Simplistic filter that adds a tunable amount of uniform white noise to the output.

raw.githubusercontent.com:filmgrain.glsl.name: Film Grain v1
raw.githubusercontent.com:filmgrain.glsl.desc:
and Film Grain v2
Two configurable shaders for applying gaussian-weighted white noise to the image. v2 is a smoothed version of v1, which uses an extra gaussian blur pass to shift the grain frequency spectrum. Both versions can trivially be adapted to add film grain to other channels besides LUMA by just adding it to the list of hooks.

github:haasn/gentoo-conf/antiring.hook.name: Antiringing
github:haasn/gentoo-conf/antiring.hook.desc: This is an antiringing filter that works by clamping to the local neighbourhood. Sort of inspired by the mpv built-in antiringing algorithm, but it's extended in such a way that it also works well for polar (EWA) filters, which the mpv built-in algorithm does not support at all.

github:igv/FSRCNN-TensorFlow/releases.name: FSRCNN
github:igv/FSRCNN-TensorFlow/releases.desc: Prescaler based on layered convolutional networks.

gist:tesu/196db5421559de3e9555d4f9da9d84.name: un360
gist:tesu/196db5421559de3e9555d4f9da9d84.desc: Converts equirectangular 360 degree video to be watchable, at a fixed perspective.

gist:bjin/15f307e7a1bdb55842bbb663ee1950.name: acme-0.5x
gist:bjin/15f307e7a1bdb55842bbb663ee1950.desc: Fastest 0.5x downscaler for mpv, useful for 4K video playback on FHD screen (bypass chroma upscaling and color conversion in 4K resolution).

gist:bjin/33ffbc0fbdbc00aefa21b2e44bbd27.name: lensfix
gist:bjin/33ffbc0fbdbc00aefa21b2e44bbd27.desc: Fix radial distortion commonly found in wide angle action cameras.

gist:bjin/399cb23818ad210941725ef7688934.name: hyperview
gist:bjin/399cb23818ad210941725ef7688934.desc: Dynamic stretching filter aiming to bring effects similar to GoPro SuperView.

github:haasn/gentoo-conf/mvtools.vpy.name: mvtools
github:haasn/gentoo-conf/mvtools.vpy.desc: Use MVTools's BlockFPS function to perform motion interpolation on the video in realtime.

github:haasn/gentoo-conf/nnedi3.vpy.name: nnedi3
github:haasn/gentoo-conf/nnedi3.vpy.desc: Use NNEDI3 to double the resolution of the video. This always performs a single doubling. Note that the vapoursynth-nnedi3 filter is so slow that this practically can't be used in realtime, so it's not much use in practice.

github:haasn/gentoo-conf/flash3kyuu.vpy.name: flash3kyuu
github:haasn/gentoo-conf/flash3kyuu.vpy.desc:
Use flash3kyuu to deband the video, with reasonable (mildly grainy) default settings.
Obsolete: mpv now ships with a similar debanding filter as shader.

github:mrlotfi/mpv-libunity.name: mpv-libunity
github:mrlotfi/mpv-libunity.desc: Shows a progress bar on your panel/dock using libunity

github:AN3223/dotfiles/shutup.c.name: shutup
github:AN3223/dotfiles/shutup.c.desc: Set --quiet when stderr or stdout aren't connected to a terminal

github:grmat/play-with.name: play-with
github:grmat/play-with.desc: A WebExtension that can open a video stream on a web page with an external player.

github:kelciour/playphrase.name: playphrase
github:kelciour/playphrase.desc: Search and play phrases from movies and audiobooks.

github:CogentRedTester/mpv-search-page.name: search-page
github:CogentRedTester/mpv-search-page.desc: Allows users to search for keybinds, commands, options, and properties, and have the results display on the OSD. Good for reminding oneself about   forgotten keybinds without leaving the player.

github:ehoneyse/mpv-open-anilist-page.name: open-anilist-page
github:ehoneyse/mpv-open-anilist-page.desc: Opens the Anilist page that corresponds to the currently playing (anime) file.

github:werman/noise-suppression-for-voic.name: noise-suppression-for-voice
github:werman/noise-suppression-for-voic.desc: A real-time audio noise suppression plugin for voice based on Xiph's RNNoise.
github:werman/noise-suppression-for-voic.install-notes:
Add somthing like the following to your input.conf, to use it:
N af toggle lavfi="ladspa=rnnoise:noise_suppressor"

github:ytdl-org/youtube-dl.name: youtube-dl
github:ytdl-org/youtube-dl.desc: Watch or download videos from YouTube.com and other video sites.

github:b1scoito/mpv-cut.name: mpv-cut
github:b1scoito/mpv-cut.desc: A video cutting/clipping/slicing script for mpv with support for cutting with smaller file sizes (re-encoding).

github:soystemd/mpv-selectformat.name: mpv-selectformat
github:soystemd/mpv-selectformat.desc: Presents a menu to select the format (quality) of internet videos.
